module.name: File Writer
module.description: This module writes incoming events into a file. The properties are: * Output File - The name of the output file, either absolute or relative. * Append Data - If true, event data will be appended to Output File (default) If false, the Output File will be deleted first * Split Files - If "true", the Output File is split into several files (with added prefix X_, where X from {1,2,..}) to keep the file size low. Set "false" if not intended. See also property File Size. * File Size - Maximum size of a log file in bytes. Default is 10 MByte. Note that the size of the file is checked *after* writing a single event, so it's not guaranteed that the size really stays below the File Size
